title: BRIEF-Boeing Board Elects David Calhoun As Lead Director
text: March 16, 2018 / 7:35 PM / in 30 minutes BRIEF-Boeing Board Elects David Calhoun As Lead Director Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Boeing Co: * BOEING BOARD ELECTS CALHOUN LEAD DIRECTOR, EFFECTIVE APRIL 30TH; DUBERSTEIN TO BE NOMINATED AS DIRECTOR FOR 2018-2019 TO AID TRANSITION * BOEING - ‍ KENNETH DUBERSTEIN TO BE NOMINATED FOR RE-ELECTION AT MEETING AS A DIRECTOR TO SERVE AN ADDITIONAL YEAR FROM 2018 TO 2019​ * BOEING - ‍BOARD HAS ALSO APPROVED A ONE-TIME WAIVER OF ITS DIRECTOR RETIREMENT POLICY IN ORDER TO NOMINATE DUBERSTEIN FOR RE-ELECTION AS A DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
